summary: Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.
cast: The Marx Brothers|Groucho Marx|Harpo Marx|Chico Marx|Zeppo Marx|Lillian Roth|Margaret Dumont|Louis Sorin|Hal Thompson|Margaret Irving|Kathryn Reece|Robert Greig|Edward Metcalfe|The Music Masters|Robert Allen|Donald MacBride|Ann Roth
title: El conflicto de los Marx
